org.apache.cassandra.io.util

Class RandomAccessReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.RandomAccessFile
      • org.apache.cassandra.io.util.RandomAccessReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput, java.io.DataOutput, java.lang.AutoCloseable, FileDataInput
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompressedRandomAccessReader, ThrottledReader

    public class RandomAccessReader
extends java.io.RandomAccessFile
implements FileDataInput
